description: was the first born son of Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki. He was initially thought to be the most suitable successor of his father`s teachings, however, it was his younger brother Asura that ended up inheriting this mantle — a decision that would lead the two brothers to fight against each other. Indra is also credited with being the creator of ninjutsu, and the progenitor of the Uchiha clan.
name: Ootsutsuki Indra
